verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
When I see a brother standing like a mountain,
When I see a sister glowing like a fire,
Something inside me like a bubbling fountain,
Quickens my faith, makes me want to take
Just…another step higher –

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
(chorus)
'Cause I know
If He did it for them God will do it for me
He'll break the bonds, right the wrongs and set me free,
O, if He did it for them, God will do it for me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
When I see a brother who's been through a battle
Lifting his hands in a victory song
A sister who knows what it is to be shackled
Stand and proclaim, that in Jesus' name
She's free once again-
